reviews.review: easy to learn hard to master

I was playing Half Life more then two decades ago when a friend of mine suggested I try a patch called Counter Strike. Since then CS has been my go to game and even though I have strayed time to time I always do a full circle to come back. If you want to play a 'working' FPS that is forever evolving has a great competitive community then look no further. Tens of thousands of hours of enjoyment and counting. I hope I can continue to keep up with the crowd for years to come :D

Play this if you like FPS games, but not if you're Russian.

The tactical game I do enjoy it more than dota 2, I had played for 4000+ hours on that game yet I stopped playing it anymore. Because, the ranking system of csgo is much more better than dota 2's. In csgo, based on my experience in 1200+ hours, you can still rank up even u lose the game, as long as you are doing well individually compared to strong enemies. Unlike dota 2, you have to win a game to gain the mmr points.
The only thing I am not happy with is, there are cheaters around in csgo. If the problem can be solved completely, csgo might get more new players soon.
